name: xrneq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), cxrn(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Equality theorem for the range Cartesian product, inference form. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 16-Dec-2020.)
